name: Spirits Link
description:
You play a Chameleon adventurer who leaves exploring the haunted ruins of spirits. Try to keep in touch with the spirits on your side, otherwise you will be imprisoned with a curse.

The goal is always kept a spirit on your side to escape the curse. For this, it will be necessary to know the spirits of these places correctly.

Lexic: 
AF (Yellow bar, or second bar below the foe blue bar) = Affinity: when an foe spirit reach 10 AF, it replaces your companion spirit
Purple bar = Remaining turns before your companion spirit quit (= Game over)HP (Blue bar) = Healh remaining (if reach 0 = Game over)
First bar below the foe blue bar = The type of attack that the foe spirit used in preceded turn is represented here (blue, green, red)
